# XmlElementExtensions.GetParentElement method

Gets the parent element of the current element.

```csharp
public static XmlElement? GetParentElement(this XmlElement @this)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| this | The element for which to get the parent element. |

## Return Value

The parent element of the current element.

## Remarks

This is basically a strongly-typed version of `ParentNode`.
